document.discussion_title: YWP AC pays tribute to late member
document.topic_text: YWP AC pays tribute to late member The club welcomes all to join time trials on Wednesdays 8 hours ago YELLOWWOOD Park Athletics Club pays tribute to Abie Burton, a pass member who died on Thursday, 14 April. The club welcomes all to join time trials on Wednesdays at 5.30pm sharp for all runners and walkers. Time trial results from 6 April: 2,5km walk: Steve Conway 16.58, Leanne Hancock 27.01, Sue Knight 27.01. 2.5km run: Jennifer Sutton 11.58, Mike Sutton 11.58, Joshua Msibi, 12.43, Dowan Burton 13.16, JP Sharrock 15.02, Lloyd Tarboton 15.02, Sandra Conway 15.58, Roxanne Tarboton 17.19. 4km run: Sydney Khuzwayo 16.14, Garath Ormshaw 19.18, Martin Birtwhistle 19.24, JP Wessels 19.41, Blessing Mhlongo 21.30. 8km run: Sihle Langa 30.57, Garth Hancock 38.43. Time trial results from 13 April: 2.5km walk : Sue Knight 25.00 (personal best). 2.5km run: JP Sharrock 15.20, Roxanne Tarboton 17.03, Chuka Uba 19.33, Gareth Allen 19.33. 4km run: Johnson Dayal 18.48, Blessing Mhlongo 19.50, Martin Birtwhistle 20.03, Emmanuel Ntombela 21.34, Zolani Nhluwayo 21.38, Lloyd Tarboton 22.47, Sandra Conway 26.35, Dowan Burton 28.30, Bridget Sigwebela 28.30. 4km walk: Steve Conway 27:27; Willie Bothma 28:56; Hazel Gace 38:02; Derek Gace 38:08; 8km run: Phiwa Mthembu 27:52; Sihle Langa 30:55; Joshua Msibi 31:32; Sydney Khuzwayo 31:49; Yellowwood Park time trials from 20 April: 2.5km walk: Chad Randall 11.59, Derek Gace 18.13, Hazel Gace 18.13, Bridget Sigwebela 18.13, Garath Ormshaw 18.13, Dowan Burton 18.13, JP Wessels 18.13, Steve Conway 18.13, Jennifer Sutton 18.13, Mike Sutton 18.13. 2.5km run: Chad Randall 11.59, Garath Ormshaw 18.13, Hazel Gace 18.13, Derek Gace 18.13, Bridget Sigwebela 18.13, Mike Sutton 18.13, Damon Schoon 18.13, Jennifer Sutton 18.13, Dowan Burton 18.13, JP Wessels 18.13. 4km run: Neil Jonker 21.54, Zolani Nhluwayo 21.54. 8km run: Sihle Langa 29.48 (personal best), Richard Mayaza 31.30, Bheki Ngidi 36.23, Elliot Holmes 36.49. SHARE
